timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-27T04:06:07", "sender_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "daniel0kyritsis@gmail.com", "subject": "Request for Guarantor Details \u2013 iQ The Arcade Booking", "message": "Hello Daniel ,\\n\\nThank you for your application for accommodation at iQ The Arcade.\\n\\nAs the official accommodation partner for UCL, we are assisting with the booking process for your chosen residence. To proceed with your booking, we kindly ask you to provide the details of your guarantor.\\n\\nPlease include the following information:\\n\\n-\\nFull Name\\n\\n-\\nEmail Address\\n\\n-\\nContact Number\\n\\n-\\nFull Residential Address\\n\\n-\\nDate of Birth\\n\\n-\\nRelationship to You\\n\\nOnce we receive these details, we will be able to move forward with the next steps of your booking.\\n\\nIf you have any questions or require support, feel free to reach out.\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\n--\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hello Daniel , Thank you for your application for accommodation at iQ The Arcade. As the official accommodation partner for UCL, we are assisting with the booking process for your chosen residence. To", "direction": "outbound", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "daniel0kyritsis@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: Yeah, hello. Am I speaking with Daniel here?
Speaker B: Yes, you're talking about Daniel here.
Speaker A: Yeah. Daniel Rashad, the site calling you from Amber.
Speaker B: I can't hear you.
Speaker A: Daniel Rashad, the site calling you from Amber. Student.
Speaker B: Dude, I can't hear you. You're not loud enough.
Speaker A: Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp? Huh? Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp?
Speaker B: Is it fine?
